```{r}
library(readr)
data <- read_csv("Diamonds.csv")
attach(data)
```
```{r}
head(data)
```
```{r}
plot(TotalPrice~Carat)
```
```{r}
model = lm(TotalPrice~Carat+I(Carat^2))
summary(model)
```
```{r}
newx = data.frame(Carat=0.5)
predict.lm(model, newx, interval='confidence')
```
```{r}
predict.lm(model, newx, interval='prediction')
```
